snippet: The $105 million proposal would begin planning on a two-stage program in which a robotic spacecraft would grab a small asteroid and drag it back toward Earth.
abstract: Budget being readied by Obama administration includes $105 million proposal for two-stage National Aeronautics and Space Administration program in which a robotic spacecraft would grab a small asteroid and drag it back toward Earth for analysis.
lead_paragraph: The $105 million proposal would begin planning on a two-stage program in which a robotic spacecraft would grab a small asteroid and drag it back toward Earth.
